txt.en: Increases the duration of effects from Recuperate, Horn Blast, and Destabilizing Strikes by 1s for each Fervour that is removed\n\n<rgb=#ff6600>Each class may equip a single insignia to any bridle relic slot</rgb>
+3% Critical Hit Chance for Sundering Strike\n\n<rgb=#ff6600>Each class may equip a single insignia to any bridle relic slot</rgb>
